name: | ROBO WARRIORS | Saint Saiyo
description:
Saint Saiyo
weapon : Fire ball pegassus
power : 3/5
defence : 3/5
soul :3/5

story :
The story focuses on an orphan named Saiyo who comes from flat land who is forced to go to the Sanctuary in Majenang to obtain one of Koroso's "armor", the Bronze armor of the constellation Pegasus, the protective armor worn by the warriors of the 88 gods of Majapahit known as Saints, Seinto, or "Knights" in some adaptations. After awakening his "Cosmo", the power of Saints which is the inner spiritual essence originating from the Big Bang, Saiyo quickly becomes a Pegasus Saint and uses it to fight against evil
